terms.meaning: Computer systems ka ability hai jo human intelligence mimic kare.
terms.example: Siri, Alexa AI assistants hain.

terms.meaning: Computers ka data se automatically learn karne ka method.
terms.example: Netflix recommendations ML use karta hai.

terms.meaning: Neural networks use kar ke complex patterns recognize karna.
terms.example: Image recognition mein deep learning use hota hai.

terms.meaning: Step by step instructions jo computer ko problem solve karne ke liye diye jate hain.
terms.example: Sorting algorithm data ko arrange karta hai.

terms.meaning: Data se insights nikalne ka scientific approach.
terms.example: Sales data analyze kar ke trends pata karna.

terms.meaning: Bohot large aur complex datasets jo traditional tools se handle nahi ho sakte.
terms.example: Facebook ke billions users ka data.

terms.meaning: Human brain ki tarah interconnected nodes ka network.
terms.example: Image classification mein CNN use hota hai.

terms.meaning: Labeled data use kar ke model train karna.
terms.example: Email spam detection ke liye labeled emails use karna.

terms.meaning: Bina labels ke data mein patterns dhundna.
terms.example: Customer segmentation clustering se karna.

terms.meaning: Trial and error se learning, rewards aur penalties ke through.
terms.example: Game playing AI jaise AlphaGo.

terms.meaning: Data ka individual measurable property ya characteristic.
terms.example: House price prediction mein area, location features hain.

terms.meaning: Training ke liye use hone wala data collection.
terms.example: MNIST handwritten digits ka dataset.

terms.meaning: Algorithm ka trained version jo predictions kar sakta hai.
terms.example: Trained spam detection model.

terms.meaning: Model ko data se patterns seekhane ka process.
terms.example: Image classifier ko thousands images pe train karna.

terms.meaning: Trained model ki performance check karna unseen data pe.
terms.example: Test set pe accuracy measure karna.

terms.meaning: Model tuning ke liye separate data set use karna.
terms.example: Hyperparameters optimize karne ke liye validation set.

terms.meaning: Model training data pe bohot specific ho jaye, new data pe fail kare.
terms.example: Model training accuracy 99% but test accuracy 60%.

terms.meaning: Model simple hai aur patterns properly capture nahi kar sakta.
terms.example: Linear model complex non-linear data pe use karna.

terms.meaning: Model mein systematic error ya prejudice.
terms.example: Hiring AI sirf male candidates prefer kare.

terms.meaning: Model ki predictions mein inconsistency.
terms.example: Same input pe different runs mein different outputs.

terms.meaning: Images process karne ke liye specialized neural network.
terms.example: Photo mein objects detect karna.

terms.meaning: Sequential data handle karne ke liye network.
terms.example: Language translation, speech recognition.

terms.meaning: Long Short-Term Memory, RNN ka advanced version.
terms.example: Long sentences mein context maintain karna.

terms.meaning: Generative Adversarial Network, fake data generate karta hai.
terms.example: Realistic fake faces generate karna.

terms.meaning: Data compress aur reconstruct karne wala network.
terms.example: Image denoising, dimensionality reduction.

terms.meaning: Attention mechanism use karne wala modern architecture.
terms.example: GPT, BERT models transformer use karte hain.

terms.meaning: Model ko important parts pe focus karne ki ability.
terms.example: Translation mein relevant words pe attention dena.

terms.meaning: Neural network mein errors ko backward propagate karna.
terms.example: Weights update karne ke liye gradient calculation.

terms.meaning: Loss function minimize karne ka optimization algorithm.
terms.example: Model weights ko iteratively improve karna.

terms.meaning: Neural network mein non-linearity introduce karne wala function.
terms.example: ReLU, Sigmoid, Tanh functions.

terms.meaning: Overfitting prevent karne ke liye neurons randomly disable karna.
terms.example: Training mein 50% neurons randomly off karna.

terms.meaning: Training stability improve karne ke liye inputs normalize karna.
terms.example: Each layer ke inputs ko mean 0, variance 1 banana.

terms.meaning: Pre-trained model ko new task ke liye fine-tune karna.
terms.example: ImageNet trained model ko medical images pe use karna.

terms.meaning: Pre-trained model ke last layers ko new data pe retrain karna.
terms.example: BERT ko sentiment analysis ke liye fine-tune karna.

terms.meaning: Complete dataset pe ek baar training pass karna.
terms.example: 100 epochs mein model train karna.

terms.meaning: Ek saath kitne samples process karne hain.
terms.example: Batch size 32 matlab 32 images ek saath.

terms.meaning: Model kitni fast learn kare, step size control karta hai.
terms.example: Learning rate 0.001 slow but stable learning.

terms.meaning: Model ki errors measure karne wala function.
terms.example: Cross-entropy loss classification ke liye.

terms.meaning: Model weights update karne ka algorithm.
terms.example: Adam, SGD, RMSprop optimizers.

terms.meaning: Overfitting prevent karne ke techniques.
terms.example: L1, L2 regularization, dropout.
